text: pinnīṭ sulaimānn nāṁ maraṇaṁ vidhiccu. appēāḷ āruṁ ā maraṇaṁ jinnukaḷe aṟiyiccilla. addēhattinṟe ūnnuvaṭi tinnukeāṇṭirunna citalukaḷeāḻike. aṅṅane sulaimān nilaṁ paticcappēāḷ jinnukaḷkk bēādhyamāyi; taṅṅaḷkk abhetika kāryaṅṅaḷ aṟiyumāyirunneṅkil apamānakaramāya ī duravasthayil kaḻiññukūṭēṇṭivarillāyirunnuvenn
